short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate stunning AI images effortlessly with Deep Dream Generator. Simply type a keyword and create unique visuals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get creative with Deep Dream Generator - AI Image! This easy-to-use Chrome extension lets you make amazing AI images just by typing a keyword. Powered by OpenAI’s DALL-E 3, it’s quick and hassle-free—no extra prompts needed.

🎯 Main Features:

✔ Just Type a Keyword: No need for complex prompts—simply enter a keyword and create!
✔ Easy Setup with OpenAI: Add your API key to start generating.
✔ Unlimited Images: Make as many images as you like!
✔ Simple Interface: Designed to be easy for everyone.
✔ Quality and Size Options: Choose 'Standard' or 'HD' quality and three image sizes (1024X1024 , 1024X1792, 1792X1024).
✔ Two Styles: Pick between “Vivid” or “Natural” styles for different looks.
✔ Save Image: When you click "save image" button the full image will viewed then you can save this image.
✔ Start Over Anytime: Reset the process whenever you want with "Start Over" button.

How to Get an OpenAI API Key?

👉 Create an OpenAI Account:
First, go to the OpenAI website. In the top right corner, you’ll see a "Sign Up" button. Click it to start creating your account. Enter your email and any other required details to finish the sign-up.

👉 Verify Your Account:
After signing up, OpenAI will send a confirmation email to the address you provided. Open this email and click on the link inside. This verification step is necessary to keep your account secure.

👉 Log into Your Account:
Once your account is verified, go back to the OpenAI website and click "Log In" at the top right. Enter your username and password to access your account.

👉 Go to the API Section:
After logging in, look for your account icon in the top right corner. Click it, and you’ll see a dropdown menu. From here, click "View API keys" to enter the API section.

👉 Generate a New API Key:
In the API section, you’ll find an option that says "Create new secret key." Click this button to generate a new API key. You’ll be asked to give it a name—choose something meaningful so you’ll remember its purpose later. After naming it, click "Create secret key."

👉 Save Your API Key:
Your new API key will appear on the screen. Copy this key and paste it somewhere secure, like a password manager, because you won’t be able to see it again for security reasons. This key is what you’ll use to connect your applications to OpenAI’s services.

👉 Set Up Billing:
OpenAI’s API requires payment based on usage. If you haven’t set up billing yet, go to the "Billing" section on the left menu, then click "Payment methods." Here, enter your credit card details and billing information, then click "Submit."

👉 Set Usage Limits:
To control spending, you can set monthly usage limits. Go to "Usage limits" in the left menu and enter a "hard limit" (your absolute maximum) and a "soft limit" (an amount that will trigger a notification). Click "Save" to finalize.

👉 Follow OpenAI’s Usage Guidelines:
Finally, take a few moments to review OpenAI’s guidelines and terms of use. These are important to ensure that the API is used responsibly and ethically.

How to Install?

1. Go to the Chrome Web Store and search for "Deep Dream Generator"
2. Click  "Add to Chrome" button.
3. Then click "Add Extension" to confirm the installation.

And, Start Generating Deep Dream AI images Easily

Disclaimer:

This extension is provided as-is without any warranties or guarantees. The images generated rely on user-provided commands and the capabilities of ChatGPT and OpenAI’s image generation tools.
